Vendors

There will be two areas for vendors this year. Hot food vendors will be assigned to our Food Court area near the entertainment stage while craft and business booths will setup in downtown.

Vendors will be contacted the week prior with their assigned location and move in time.

An expected 25k+ people in downtown Latrobe. Don't miss your chance to be a part of Vendor Row or the Food Court.

Save my spot
Great American Banana Split Celebration

A grand celebration in downtown Latrobe, PA to perpetuate Dr. Stickler's 1904 invention of the banana split.
